comments: This sequence is s_10 in Cooper's paper. - _Jason Kimberley_, Nov 25 2012

maple: A005260 := proc(n)        add( (binomial(n,k))^4,k=0..n) ;end proc:seq(A005260(n),n=0..10) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 19 2012
mathematica: Table[Sum[Binomial[n, k]^4, {k, 0, n}], {n, 0, 20}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Mar 09 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
